Home.NoExposureDetectedDetailed: Com base nos seus dados, você não esteve perto de alguém nos últimos 14 dias que deu positivo para COVID-19.
Home.ExposureDetected: Você possivelmente foi exposto ao COVID-19
Home.ExposureDetectedDetailed: Com base nos seus dados, você esteve perto de alguém nos últimos 14 dias que testou positivo para COVID-19.
Home.SeeGuidance: Veja as orientações do Canadá a respeito do COVID-19
Home.SignalDataShared: Obrigado por ajudar a diminuir a propagação

SignalDataSharedDetailed.One: Você receberá uma notificação solicitando o compartilhamento dos seus dados sigilosamente no próximo {number} dia.
SignalDataSharedDetailed.Other: Você receberá uma notificação solicitando o compartilhamento dos seus dados sigilosamente nos próximos {number} dias.

Home.DailyShareDetailed: Compartilhe seus dados para ajudar outras pessoas a saberem se estão correndo o risco de estarem expostos ao COVID-19.
Home.EnableBluetoothCTA: O Bluetooth é usado para coletar e compartilhar os dados que o COVID Shield precisa para funcionar corretamente.
Home.ExposureNotificationsDisabled: As notificaações de exposição estão desabilitadas
Home.ExposureNotificationsDisabledDetailed: Notificações de exposição são necessárias para o COVID Shield funcionar corretamente.
Home.NoConnectivityDetailed: O COVID Shield precisa de acesso a Internet para continuar verificando potenciais exposições.

OverlayOpen.BluetoothCardBody: O Bluetooth é usado para coletar e compartilhar dados necessários para o COVID Shield funcionar corretamente.
OverlayOpen.EnterCodeCardBody: Um profissional da saúde pediu para você usar um código do COVID Shield?
OverlayOpen.NotificationCardBody: Você não receberá notificações por push informando a possibilidade de exposição ao COVID-19. Notificações de potenciais exposições são importantes para retardar a propagação do COVID-19.
OverlayOpen.ExposureNotificationCardBody: Notificações de exposição são necessárias para o COVID Shield funcionar corretamente.

Tutorial.step-1: Your phone uses Bluetooth to collect and share random IDs with phones near you with COVID Shield installed. These IDs are stored securely on each phone.
Tutorial.step-2Title: If you have potentially been exposed to COVID-19
Tutorial.step-2: You will receive a notification if you have been near someone in the past 14 days who has tested positive for COVID-19.
Tutorial.step-3Title: If you test positive for COVID-19
Tutorial.step-3: Anonymously notify others who have been near you in the past 14 days that they have possibly been exposed.

Sharing.Title: Share app
Sharing.SubTitle: Every person using COVID Shield helps to slow the spread of COVID-19. Sharing this app will not share any personal data.
Sharing.Message: Join me in helping to slow the spread of COVID-19. Download the COVID Shield app: https://covidshield.app

OnboardingPermissions.Title: Your data is private
OnboardingPermissions.Body: COVID Shield takes a privacy-first approach to exposure notification.
OnboardingPermissions.Body2: Your random IDs are stored exclusively on your phone unless you choose to share them.
OnboardingPermissions.Body3: Use of COVID Shield is voluntary. You can delete your random IDs at any time.

OnboardingStart.Title: Keep yourself and others safe
OnboardingStart.Body1: Get notified if you have potentially been exposed to COVID-19.
OnboardingStart.Body2: If you test positive for COVID-19, you can choose to anonymously share your data so others can be notified of possible exposure.

ThankYou.Title: Thank you for helping
ThankYou.Body: Exposure notifications are on. You will receive a notification if COVID Shield detects that you have possibly been exposed to COVID-19.

DataUpload.FormIntro: Please enter your 8 digit COVID Shield code.
DataUpload.InfoSmall: Your random IDs will not be shared unless you give permission in the next step.
DataUpload.ConsentBody: You have been granted access by a health care professional to share the random IDs stored on your phone.
DataUpload.ConsentBody2: If you share your random IDs, others with COVID Shield who have been near you in the past 14 days will receive a notification that they have possibly been exposed. This notification will not include any information about you.
DataUpload.ConsentBody3: You will be notified once per day when new random IDs are available to be shared. You must grant permission each time for the random IDs to be shared. Sharing is voluntary.
DataUpload.ErrorBody: Your COVID Shield code could not be recognized. Please try again.

Notification.ExposedMessageTitle: You have possibly been exposed to COVID-19
Notification.ExposedMessageBody: Based on your random IDs, you have been near someone in the past 14 days who tested positive for COVID-19.
Notification.OffMessageBody: Turn on COVID Shield to get notified if you have potentially been exposed to COVID-19.
Notification.DailyUploadNotificationBody: Sharing your data helps others to know if they have possibly been exposed to COVID-19.
